name: The Contract (Galactodactyl)
description:
" W E   M I S S   Y O U "

'The Contract'
Created by M.Palma 

- = - = -
Continuing directly after 'Blood Money (oddtober vol. ii)', there is an aggressive knock on the door -- You go to investigate, and stumble into a conspiracy of profit and death. Will you succumb, or overcome and defeat capitalism?
- = - = -

If you enjoyed this, I do a lot of other fun stuff at:
 youtube.com/MatPalmaMusic

:)
